APSJournal.block.heading: Oggetto: Nome
APSJournal.block-black.name: Block: Item in Black
APSJournal.block-black.description: A stylish block to display the description and stats of an item with a black theme.
APSJournal.block-black.body:
Description of the item and its effects.

You can place an image on top of the circle to the left and it will automatically be sized to fit the circle.

APSJournal.block-card.name: Block: Card

You can place an image on top of the card to the left and it will automatically be sized to fit the card.

APSJournal.block-encounter.name: Block: Encounter
APSJournal.block-encounter.description: A stylish block for displaying encounter data and descrptions.
APSJournal.block-encounter.heading: Encounter
APSJournal.block-encounter.body:
Enter a detailed description of the environment and scenario here to read to the players.

Drag Actor tokens from your compendium into the Adversaries list on the right for easy setup of the encounter.
APSJournal.block-read-aloud.name: Block: Read Aloud (Colore del Tema)
